# Vista Documentation Welcome to the Vista documentation. Vista is a declarative UI framework for Arturo inspired by Rebol/View. ## Libraries - **Vista Core** - UI components, layout, data binding, events - **Vista Graphics** - Canvas 2D graphics and drawing ## Getting Started - [Getting Started](/vista/wiki/getting-started/) - Quick start guide - [Hello World Tutorial](/vista/wiki/core/tutorials/hello-world/) - Your first Vista app - [VID Overview](/vista/wiki/core/concepts/vid-overview/) - Introduction to the VID dialect ## Vista Core - [Concepts](/vista/wiki/core/concepts/) - Architecture and design - [Tutorials](/vista/wiki/core/tutorials/) - Step-by-step guides - [Components](/vista/wiki/core/components/) - UI component reference - [Layout](/vista/wiki/core/layout/) - Layout system reference - [Data Binding](/vista/wiki/core/data-binding/) - State and binding - [Events](/vista/wiki/core/events/) - Event handling ## Vista Graphics - [Concepts](/vista/wiki/graphics/concepts/) - Graphics fundamentals - [Tutorials](/vista/wiki/graphics/tutorials/) - Graphics guides - [Drawing](/vista/wiki/graphics/drawing/) - Drawing commands - [Transforms](/vista/wiki/graphics/transforms/) - Transformations - [Colors](/vista/wiki/graphics/colors/) - Colors and gradients - [Animation](/vista/wiki/graphics/animation/) - Animation techniques ## Building the Docs Edit files in `data/wiki/` and rebuild: ` arturo tools/build.art ` ## File Format Wiki pages use Arturo block comments. See [wiki-template.art](/vista/wiki/wiki-template/) for a template.
